Package net.viktorc.pp4j.impl

Class JavaObjectCodec

  • Object
    • JavaObjectCodec
  • public class JavaObjectCodec
extends Object
    A singleton for encoding Java objects as strings and decoding strings into Java objects. It uses the default ObjectInputStream and ObjectOutputStream classes for the serialization and deserialization of Java objects to and from byte array streams, and it uses Base64 for the encoding and decoding of the byte array streams.
    Author:
    Viktor Csomor

      • encode

        public String encode​(Object object)
              throws IOException
        Serializes the specified object into a string and encodes it using Base64.
        Parameters:
        object - The object to serialize and encode.
        Returns:
        The serialized and encoded object as a string.
        Throws:
        IOException - If the serialization fails.

      • decode

        public Object decode​(String string)
              throws IOException,
                     ClassNotFoundException
        Decodes the string and deserializes it into an object.
        Parameters:
        string - The Base64-encoded string to deserialize.
        Returns:
        The decoded and deserialized string as an object.
        Throws:
        IOException - If the deserialization fails.
        ClassNotFoundException - If the deserialization fails due to the class of the object not having been found.
        IllegalArgumentException - If the string is not a valid Base64 string.
